channel.title: Consciousness on Rishab Dhar
channel.description: Recent content in Consciousness on Rishab Dhar

item.title: Questioning the Very Existence of Free Will
item.description: What exactly is Free Will? To me, free will is the idea that we have the power of making choices that are not predetermined by the past or aren’t affected by external conditions. It’s the sense of having control over our actions and the ability to choose different possible paths. The Illusion of Choice When I consider the possibility that my choies are not as free as I believe, I start to wonder whether free will really exists?
